text:
Zenefits - https://www.zenefits.com - San Francisco, CA and Vancouver, BC

Full stack developers, VISA

Zenefits is the fastest growing SaaS company in history. We are looking for engineers who can take a concept from inception to market. The process is extremely autonomous, with little to no, management. You are the PM, tester & developer, building full-stack, who coordinates with our in-house designers.

We also need someone who is excited to innovate an archaic industry.
